full_summary:
=====================

**UV5 Bio+ Autosampler Procurement**
-------------------------------------

**Request for Proposal:**

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites eligible suppliers to submit a proposal for the supply and delivery of one (1) UV5 Bio+ Autosampler.

**Notice ID and Solicitation Number:**

* **Notice ID:** cb-8585-38203152
* **Solicitation Number:** 01R11-24-C039

**Key Details:**

* **Closing Date and Time:** 2023-10-09T07:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-09-13
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31
* **Contracting Entity:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Camille Sobczak, Technical Writer
	+ Email: [camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca](mailto:camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (204) 430-5426

**Scope of Work:**

The AAFC's Agassiz Research and Development Center requires the supply and delivery of one (1) UV5 Bio+ Autosampler. The mandatory technical criteria for this procurement are as follows:

* The respondent must hold a valid Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada.
* The respondent must meet the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price.

**Eligibility and Pre-Qualification:**

Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid. Interested suppliers must be pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement to participate in this procurement.

**Bid Submission:**

Bidders must submit a proposal in accordance with the instructions outlined in the solicitation documents. The proposal must include all required information and attachments.

**Disclaimer:**

This notice is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI only. Suppliers not pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement cannot submit a bid. Any bids received from unqualified suppliers will not be evaluated.

**Pr nécessaire:** Suppliers must download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/C from Buyandsell.gc.ca and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

You have successfully rewritten the government document of the UV5 Bio+ Autos
